channel.title: How do u make varrock a no pk zone?

item.title: How do u make varrock a no pk zone?
item.dc:creator: @logging logging

to do that can u help me on one more thing lol… how do i use update… i type ::update 5… and once everyone loggs out… no-one can get back in??? i dont know…[br][size=1]Posted on: January 10, 2007, 04:05:20 PM[/size][hr]and what file??? which one lol??? what do i type??

item.source: How do u make varrock a no pk zone?

item.title: How do u make varrock a no pk zone?
item.dc:creator: @ancientmage ancientmage
item.description:
@ancientmage wrote:

  1. Fistly Get the most South Western and North Eastern Area of which you want a safe zone.
    If you dont know how to do this, type ::coordson in the game to see your coordinates

  2. Put The South western co-ordinates in the two XXXX’s in order and the same for The Notheastern in YYYY’s

Code:

(absX >= XXXX && absX <= XXXX && absY >= YYYY && absY <=YYYY) ||

for Example if i wanted a safe zone in these co-ords

SW:2400,2640
NE: 2417,2665

It would look something like this:

Code:

(absX >= 2400 && absX <= 2640 && absY >= 2417 && absY <=2665) ||

OK now where to put this:

Search for “(absX >=” without the quotes in Client.java

go right to the end of that line, and paste there.

Read full topic
